text.en: Holding the oceanic treasury of the profound and secret aural lineage
Of the lords of speech, Mañjughoṣas of the Sakya tradition,
text.en-trans: zabsang nyengyü gyatsö dzö zung né

text.en: You are without equal in creating a feast of excellent explanation,
text.en-trans: lek shé gatön gyé la da mepa

text.en: Glorious guru, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: palden lamé zhab la solwa deb
